Terms and Conditions

  • Cards accepted: Visa, Mastercard, American Express.
  • Please note that we unfortunately cannot accept card payment from the following countries: Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Crimea Region (Ukraine/Russia), Syrian Arab Republic.
  • University of Essex V.A.T. number: GB594794865.
